answer.great, now let's move on to some technic: yes so i have applied machine learning algorithms to predict whether a mushroom was poisionous or not, I used Xgboost for prediction, Also i had to drop most of columns because of too much missing and i imputed values on the others
answer.interesting can you explain how you hand: well i used many imputation technique depending on the number of missing values, for low missing values for categories i used mode and for continuous data i used mean, other than that for too many missing values i used KNN iputation and if too much was missing i dropped it.
answer.i see what factors did you consider when: well, i plotted the values for continuius data i saw if there was any outlier or not and used it to judge whether to use median or mean
